description.lang: TechniSat's smart UHD / 4K TVs with triple TwinTuner and Z-Wave smart home gateway (requires Z-Wave USB stick), with WiFi and LAN connectivity will be the central hub of your smart home.The CONNECT app by TechniSat for smartphones and tablets lets you easily setup, view and control your smart home, even when youre not at home.Not a fan of apps? Not a problem! TechniSat brings your smart home to the big screen TV. Putting easy view and control of your smart home at you fingertips with the click of a button on your remote control.
